workflow_id.description: the unique ID for this workflow object (auto-created)

timestamp.description: the time (epoch) when this workflow object was created

priority.description: the priority of the workflow in relation to other workflows

anyOf.description: the time (epoch) when message queues were created for the workflow; null if queues have not (yet) been created

_mq_activation_retry_at_ts.description: internal use only: when to retry requesting message queues from MQS

aborted.description: whether the workflow has been aborted
